item.title: Dynamic Time Warping and Hierarchical Clustering with {gapminder}
item.description: Goal I want to find which countries are the most similar to each other in terms of their life expectancy, population and GDP over the years Load packages suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse)) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dtwclust)) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(factoextra)) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(gapminder)) suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ggrepel)) Weâ€™ll use dtwclust for hierarchical clustering using the dtw_basic as the distance measure. If you are not familiar with these methods, please read about dynamic time warping and hierachical clustering. Data We are going to use the gapminder dataset for comparing different countries.
